definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: prostrate (NH [[סחף]], Aram. [[סְחַף]] sh.ap (for e)dafi/zw, Lu 19:42); As saḫâpu, throw down, overwhelm);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. [[מָטָר סׂחֵף]] Pr 28:3 a prostrating rain (beating down grain), [[וְאֵין]] [[לָָחֶם]] and (so) there is no bread.

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. [[נִסְחַף אַבִּירֶיְ]] Je 46:15 why are thy mighty ones (or, why is thy bull, i.e. Apis, Hi Ew Gf) prostrated? but rd. perh. [[נׇס חָף אַבִּירְ ְלאׂ עָמַד]] (LXX Mich Gie Co) why hath Apis fled, thy bull doth not stand?
